div.div: Augsburg College vs. St. Olaf College

tr.td: St. Olaf wins toss, elects to defer. Augsburg to receive
Kyle McMahan kickoff 53 yards to the AUG12, U.Smith-Brewer return 16 yards to the AUG28 (Tommy Fleetham).
U.Smith-Brewer rush for 2 yards to the AUG30 (Keion Samuel).
